catalog.description: A data catalog which contains this dataset.

includedDataCatalog.description: A data catalog which contains this dataset (this property was previously 'catalog', preferred name is now 'includedInDataCatalog').

includedInDataCatalog.description: A data catalog which contains this dataset.

distribution.description: A downloadable form of this dataset, at a specific location, in a specific format.

spatial.description: The range of spatial applicability of a dataset, e.g. for a dataset of New York weather, the state of New York.

temporal.description: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset, e.g. for a 2011 census dataset, the year 2011 (in ISO 8601 time interval format).

datasetTimeInterval.description: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset, e.g. for a 2011 census dataset, the year 2011 (in ISO 8601 time interval format).
